title: Whoops

fields.name: Ability:
fields.value:
- At night, attack a player by slipping on a banana peel while running with a knife
- During the day, claim oopsie daisy. You may not be hung today (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You appear innocent and as town to all investigative roles, since it was only _accidental_ manslaughter
- You may choose to make your attack astral but lowering your attack to basic if you want by letting go of the knife when you slip.

desc:
Post 5042
_”Your honor, my client claims oopsie daisy”_
